title: Apocalyptic Game - UI Sound Effects
description: A highly focused & proprietary blend of RPG game sound effects. Collect crafting minerals & materials to create weapons, mods, items or buildings. Have all the high-quality sound needed to slot in different esthetics to your character's inventory.
longDescription:
Audio Demos

Inside this devastating sound library you’ll discover a bountiful assortment of noteworthy game ready, organic & designed special effects, abilities, achievements, game items, simple to complex sounds, versatile crafting essentials, apocalyptic UI/UX sounds, shelter creation & building sounds, pickups, consumable items, locks, mechanisms, materials, inventory & bag sounds.

The Apocalyptic Game sound effects collection gives veteran producers, game developers, & sound designers the quality that is needed for big game title releases & a vast catalog of almost every futuristic & post apocalyptic sound type needed for your games audio & sound sets. From natural & organic sounds minimal designed SFX to simple & complex & processed digital sound effects. This sound library will complete just about any project where inventory, menu, treasure, awards, items, crafting, materials, building, & creation sounds are required.

Apocalyptic Game sound library was highly curated & created specifically for game developers & sound designers to provide a valuable sound resource, offer versatility, value, & a useful sound palette of sounds that can be used in longevity & have a shelf life for years to come. Trust us, if you want an end of the world deal, the sounds in Apocalyptic Game are top notch & the library will pay for itself not once but over & over again. Even after an Armageddon. 

If you didn’t know, now you do. Apocalyptic Game is useful for genres such as survival horror, MMO RPG, action & adventure, post apocalyptic, retro, futuristic & sci-fi.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 39 special abilities like spread public order, slow time, increase unit damage, stimulate growth
  • 24 achievements, level ups, gained XP, quest issued
  • 27 armor & clothing sounds in sets: cloth, leather, metal plate, metal thin, synth hi-tech
  • 32 crating minerals & material sounds like acid container, crystals, nuclear material, bone use/pick up & more
  • 177 organic & designed game items – useful for all in-game actions – computer chip pick up, burned book, liquid, ammo crate, coolant, ID card, & more
  • 37 consumable items like radiation pills, eat dry food, consume bubbles, use bandaids, inject stimpak, health spray
  • 29 mechanisms that are perfect for ammo, reloading, weapons, & locks/unlocks
  • 31 alerts & notifications – common, uncommon, rare, energy point
  • 40 shelter creation & building select & placement – radio station set up, construction complete, create water treatment facility, build watch tower
  • 56 UI/UX – button, clicks, insufficient resources, general scroll, add point, map popup, place item, inventory ammo, medicine, weapon
  • 48 building UI – build, place, repair, select, add, salvage

Number of Audio Waves: 540

Number of Audio Cues: 540

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: N/A

Minutes of audio provided: 6 m

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5

Documentation: Content List
